mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVU_CDP(EVU_STD_ID, CDP_CD, CDP_NM, CDP_TYPE, CDP_MISSION, INS_USER_ID, INS_YMDHMS, POST_CD) SELECT #{nowEvuStdId}, CDP_CD, CDP_NM, CDP_TYPE, CDP_MISSION, #{insUserId} INS_USER_ID, #{insYmdhms} INS_YMDHMS, POST_CD FROM EVU_CDP WHERE EVU_STD_ID = #{lastEvuStdId}
